news_title: Ripple Secures UK FCA Registration to Offer Limited Crypto Services and Expand Payment Operations
news_subtitle: Ripple is now registered with the UK FCA to offer limited crypto and payment services. The FCA approval boosts XRP use in cross-border payments and supports global expansion. UK registration strengthens Ripple’s partnerships and attracts institutional investment into crypto. The ...

Ripple has received UK FCA authorisation enabling Ripple Markets UK Ltd to operate as an Electronic Money Institution and Cryptoasset firm. This expands Ripple’s licensing portfolio, enhancing cross-border payments in the UK. Read original article on aicryptocore.com

news_title: Ripple Secures FCA Approval for UK Subsidiary Operations
